entry.title: 3M SG-O - Scotchgard Heavy Duty Water Shield Sg-O 7100133999
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 10.97

[shortdesc]

Scotchgard Heavy Duty Water Shield

  • Be ready for any adventure, no matter the weather with Scotchgard™ Heavy Duty Water Shield
  • Whether your kids' coats need an extra layer of defense, or your patio furniture needs some serious water repellency, Scotchgard™ Heavy Duty Water Shield defies the elements with an improved formulation that helps keep clothes and gear drier, longer
  • So gear up, get out there and enjoy the great outdoors with Scotchgard™ Heavy Duty Water Shield.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Safe for use on polyester, nylon, polypropylene, cotton, leather, suede and more
  • Provides durable protection from the elements with just one application
  • Ideal for use on outerwear, rain gear, umbrellas, patio furniture, outdoor gear, backpacks, luggage, canvas tarps, boat covers and more
  • Repels water during use and in storage
  • Fabric maintains breathability
  • Dries odourless
  • One can provides 60 sq
  • ft
  • (5.6 sq
  • m) of water resistance on light nylon or 20 sq
  • ft
  • (1.9 sq
  • m) on heavier fabrics
  • Reapply Scotchgard™ Heavy Duty Water Shield seasonally
    		•

entry.title: 3M Scotchblok 6718 - Scotchblok Masking Paper 06718 18 Inch x 750' (457.2 mm x 228.6 m) 7000051780
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Masking Paper
Price: 99.97

[shortdesc]

3M Scotchblok Masking Paper, 06718, 18 in x 750 ft (457.2 mm x 228.6 m)

  • 3M™ Scotchblok™ Masking Paper is specially coated to provide excellent resistance to paint solvents, urethanes, base coats, and clear coats
  • The bonded formulation reduces contamination of freshly painted and varnished surfaces with paper fibres, while the highly conformable construction attaches easily to a range of shapes.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotchblok
    Application General/Bulk Masking
    Color Gold
    Length 750 ft
    Width 18 Inch
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Masking Paper

    Product Information

  • Polycoated backing prevents bleed-through
  • Excellent conformability
  • Tightly bonded
  • Offers the best penetration resistance from all solvents used in automotive aftermarket repairs and refinishing
  • Holds up well under wet sanding conditions
  • Available in a variety of sizes
    		•

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 79.43

[shortdesc]

3M Sheet Molded Compound & Fibreglass Repair Adhesive, 08243, 6.8 fl. oz. (200 ml)

  • 3M™ Sheet Molded Compound/Fibreglass Repair Adhesive is a high performance, two-part urethane used to bond sheet molded compound (SMC), and fibreglass reinforced polyester (FRP) body panels to each other and to metal frames
  • Metal must be primed with a 3M™ Two-Part Epoxy Primer, 08278 before adhesive application.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • High performance
  • Excellent sag resistance
  • Two-part urethane adhesive
  • Bondable to metal and fibreglass
  • Fast drying
  • Automatic mixing
  • 1 minute worktime
    		•

entry.title: 3M 402C - Bondo Fibreglass Resin, 402C, 30 Oz (852 ml) 402C 7100054028
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 23.22

[shortdesc]

Bondo Fibreglass Resin, 402C, 30 oz (852 ml)

  • Bondo® Fibreglass Resin is the same high-strength polyester resin that is used to build most boats
  • Can be used alone or with fibreglass tape, cloth or mat to repair damaged fibreglass boats, snowmobiles, jet skis, bathtubs and showers.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Extra Product Information

  • Bondo® Fibreglass Resin can also be used as a sealer on damaged and rotted wood
  • It works to seal concrete, is great on large or small metal rust-outs and joins most surfaces together while creating a strong and long lasting bond.

    • Product Information

  • Use during stage 2 of the 3M™ Body Repair System
  • Waterproof
  • Compatible with all paints, including gel coat and marine paints
  • Includes 3M™ Liquid Hardener
  • Sandable in less than two hours
  • Paste-like consistency
    		•

entry.title: 3M 8579C - 3M Leather and Vinyl Repair Kit, 8579C 7000142732
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 16.39

[shortdesc]

3M Leather and Vinyl Repair Kit, 8579C

  • 3M™ Leather and Vinyl Repair Kit 8579C patches and repairs upholstery damage, such as tears, burns and cuts in both vinyl and leather
  • Included is a colour matching guide to help determine which colour and grain paper will match the damaged surface, to ensure a completely blended and professional looking repair
  • 3M™ Leather and Vinyl Repair Kit includes heat cure repair compounds (in red, blue, green, yellow, white, brown, and black) vinyl adhesives, a grain paper packet (in coarse to smooth patterns), backing fabric, practice vinyl, a spatula, mixing cup, heat transfer tool, and the colour match guide.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Extra Product Information

  • 3M™ Leather and Vinyl Repair Kit 8579C can repair everything from cigarette burns to tears in a variety of surfaces, including car seats and upholstery, dashboards, motorcycle seats, vinyl tops, marine and RV upholstery, luggage and furniture.

    • Product Information

  • Repairs a variety of surfaces
  • Easy to use
  • Liquid consistency
    		•

entry.title: 3M 50416 - Dry Guide Coat Cartridge Orange 1.76 Oz. (50 G) 7000034533
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Body Fillers
Price: 45.00

[shortdesc]

3M Dry Guide Coat Cartridge, 50416, orange, 1.76 oz. (50 g)

  • 3M™ Dry Guide Coat Cartridge is a dry powder with applicator used to highlight surface imperfections and sand scratches prior to finishing with abrasives
  • When sanding polyester filler, it ensures the filler is flat with no ripples and that the body styling lines and contours are straight and correct
  • It also ensures the total primed area is sanded prior to top coating
  • It requires no masking and there is no dry time involved
  • It can also be used for both wet and dry sanding and contains no solvents.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Application Surface Preparation
    Color Orange
    Origin Country United Kingdom
    Product Type Body Fillers
    Size 50 g

    Product Information

  • Bright orange colour makes it easier to see on dark coloured primers
  • Requires no masking
  • No dry time involved
  • Can be used for both wet and dry sanding
  • Contains no solvents

    • Suggested Application

  • Used in the dry primer sanding process
  • Used to highlight surface imperfections and sand scratches prior to finishing with abrasives
    		•

3M Lightweight Body Filler, 05801, 7.8 lbs (3.5 kg)
